website_summaries.verdict: A little pricier than the other models but with a more powerful 1500W motor.
pros: A professional-quality blender with a decent price tag
Blends quickly and produces smooth results
Super quick to clean and put away
Tough motor works well without any suspicious burning smells
cons: Advertised as quiet but users reported it was still loud

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I really thought this was going to be a good replacement for my Nutri Ninja Auto IQ that recently burnt up. I was looking for something different because the Ninja is sooooo loud. This Hamilton Beach blender is definetely somewhat quiter but I would NOT recommend it for making smoothies. It has to be run through several times and does not blend to the consistency of the Ninja. I will be relegating this blender to the back shelf and ordering another Ninja. I really wanted to like the Hamilton Beach but it just doesn't do a good job (especially for smoothies).
customer_reviews.author: PDawg

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Noise
customer_reviews.text: This blender was my worst purchase in 2018. Maybe in all of this decade. My old one died after a wonderful 10 years of use. I wanted another really good blender. Not only is this blender louder than a leaf blower outside your window, the lid is difficult to use, and the jar fits awkwardly on the base. I didn't return it because I live in a rural area and need the blender every day. I hate it.
customer_reviews.author: Mildred Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in October. Used maybe 10 times. Super loud even with the cover on it and yesterday was blending bullion cubes. Bullion cubes! Broke the side out of the blender. Good thing I’ve never used ice in the blender that would have broke it much faster. Not a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: The jar assembly is has poor quality and is expensive to replace.
customer_reviews.text: This blender base is high quality. The jar assembly is not. After 7 months of nearly daily use crushing ice, the plastic jar cracked at the base and started leaking. I searched for a replacement jar. The only place I could find one was on the Hamilton Beach website for $89. I decided to replace the entire blender with another brand. Poor quality indeed.
customer_reviews.author: 1d655480

customer_reviews.title: I really like this blender
customer_reviews.text: I really like this blender, I use it mainly for smoothies. It is able to chop up kale and frozen fruit easily. The noise shield which doubles as a serving pitcher if needed is great.
customer_reviews.author: gottawalkthedoggies

customer_reviews.title: A practical pro machine for the kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very practical pro machine for home use. Makes smoothies and shakes with manual and auto controls and you can add stuff while mixing.
customer_reviews.author: vonborks

customer_reviews.title: Powerful blender
customer_reviews.text: Husband is on a milkshake craze. Our 30 year old Waring wasn't cutting it. Bought this and was astonished at its power and efficiency. Drop in ice cream, fruit, berries and watch it work. Haven't really tried all the things it says it can blend and mix yet but have no doubt that whatever we throw in it will be a satisfactory result. I hand wash it (just my preference) and it cleans up so easily. If you need a strong blender, you won't be disappointed. This is a BIG blender/base combo so plan on losing some counter space or have a big empty cupboard handy.
customer_reviews.author: Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 7 months.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in October 2017, stopped working on July 6, 2018. Also, despite the cover/hood provide to minimize noise, it is till the noisiest blender I've ever had. Takes longer to blend fruit and veggies for smoothies than my 28 year old no frills Oster Blender. Not worth the price at all.
customer_reviews.author: Russell B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a million dollar blender. Powerful, and not oversized.
customer_reviews.author: Jason R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, until it dies.
customer_reviews.text: I loved it very much, but 1 month later it won't even turn on anymore. Update: March 19, 2018 I emailed Hamilton Beach directly and received a new blender within 1 week. Once again, the blender was fantastic, but 1 week later it has stopped working. It won't turn on. I've emailed Hamilton Beach again and they are not willing to do anything about it. This product is cheaply made. Stay far away from it.
customer_reviews.author: chelsey minthorn

customer_reviews.title: It's not what you think
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product and was really excited as I saw all the ads and reviews. However, when received it I was so disappointed once I started using this product. It didn't chop nuts well and the smoothies left little grain like granules. I returned this product and bought instant pot Ace Blender. Love it. more powerful! and it chopped nuts
customer_reviews.author: hoppers

customer_reviews.title: Had this for a year: still working great
customer_reviews.text: I got this because it can blend hot liquids and it's doing great at that. Overall I like it for its variable speed control, its small foot print. It was a good choice for our kitchen. Got it more than a year ago and it is used 3-4 times per week. con: it's really hard to clean underneath the blades. But I suppose that'd be true for all non-removable-blade blenders.
customer_reviews.author: M. Woodyard

customer_reviews.title: This is only blender I use
customer_reviews.text: I have been making my own frappacinos at home for 8 years. This is the only reliable appliance I have found. NOthing lasts forever but this lasts longer than the rest and the hood keeps the sound down. Thank you! I have tried almost all of them under $200 - won't pay all that money for a vitamix.
customer_reviews.author: B. Berns

customer_reviews.title: Died after less than a month and a half
customer_reviews.text: Less than a month and a half after buying it, it won’t even turn on. Was good while it lasted but expect more of a life span than this! It’s gotten light use, too. My husband made smoothies with a couple times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A. Swanson

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is for my elderly mom. I got her ninja blender but it was too involved for her to remember and use. Hamilton blender is simple lid and simple button. Blade stays on the jar, so the whole jar/blade assembly has to clean as a unit in the dishwasher. That means, I think, water will stay in the connector.
customer_reviews.author: ventingisok

customer_reviews.title: It's ok..
customer_reviews.text: For this much money it's disappointing how wide the pour spout is. Makes pouring into bottles cumbersome. Also for this price, it's surprising that the entire body is made of plastic instead of glass. It's fairly quiet for a blender. It's not too bad to clean.
customer_reviews.author: UvaroviteKing

customer_reviews.title: great blender
customer_reviews.text: I love it, since I got it I have used it at least once a day sometimes 2 to 3 times a day making smoothies. It has lots of power handles ice no problem and cleans easy I definitely recommend it, yes it was pricey but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: T Mc

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome blender and I have now used it for a year. I have used it every day to make my smoothies and they come out really smooth. It is sturdy and durable and easy to maintain. The reason I gave it a 4 star instead of a 5 is that the jar is plastic and with everyday use it has become dull and used up. Also it makes a loud noise. I would like to replace the plastic jar but seems like an expensive proposition. I wish they would make glass jars.
customer_reviews.author: Falcon55

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Blending
customer_reviews.text: This blender is exactly like described at the order site. I make my own cream of tomato soup from my home canned tomatoes. This blender is as good as the Bullet for chopping up the tomatoes seeds. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Our soul blender!
customer_reviews.text: This is our soul-blender. After two years, still going strong. We tried all the ultra expensive ones, but realized they are mostly meant for juicing, but don’t necessarily make great smoothies. This Hamilton Beach is the ultimate smoothie blender and the only blender we will ever need again!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Watson

customer_reviews.title: The Beast - Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Blend chop grate anything. This is a super duty blender we call the Beast. It will blend smoothies with lots of ice and frozen strawberries effortlessly.
customer_reviews.author: TDM

customer_reviews.title: Bargain for quieter smoothie maker.
customer_reviews.text: Much quieter than my past ninjas! Loud smoothie makers always woke the family up. But I wasn't going to pay hundreds for a Vitamix. We use ours daily so I thought this was worth a try for $100. Starts out with a few slow pulses which make you think it is getting stuck, but it is not, then speeds up. Really powerful blend. The sound shield definitely makes it quieter. Larger so it does take up more space on the counter. Overall really happy with it. Bought a second one for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Powerful, simple controls, reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Keep looking.
customer_reviews.text: There’s no handle on the piece you actually blend it. Pretty annoying. The only option is to empty it into the “quiet shield” to use that handle. The quiet shield is also basically useless. It doesn’t do anything to quiet the noise. The blender itself is fine I guess. But wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Ingle

customer_reviews.title: Not if you want a quiet blender
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blender because it was advertised as quiet. At the lowest speed it was quieter, but as soon as it had to do any serious blending, it wasn’t much quieter than our old Oster. So I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Judith J. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Big powerful blender
customer_reviews.text: Big blender. After a few weeks it has taken all our frozen fruits and done a great job making shakes. It is winter, so we haven't done ice yet, but we have not turned the dial up past 7 either. It is much quieter than our previous blender, so 'loud' is subjective. Unless cranked all the way up, it is not bad.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Shilling

customer_reviews.title: My only complaint is that the insert/cup in the lid comes out TOO easily
customer_reviews.text: The first blender I've had that can pulverize the strawberry seeds in my smoothies. Also with the right amount of liquid and patience will puree dates without leaving any lumps. And it's quieter than less powerful blenders. My only complaint is that the insert/cup in the lid comes out TOO easily, so unless I actively hold it on, it falls out almost every time I remove the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Scott T

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender
customer_reviews.text: First time I used it was sppoky it started in the smoothie cycle all by itself well it was set in that setting too 2minutes and I had the best smoothie I have ever had. Cleaning cycle went boob da-da-bing and it was clean now I am going to update this in 6 months but it has a metal drive and receiver.it did not smell like it burnt anything I figure spend the money and get the best
customer_reviews.author: timmythegeek

customer_reviews.title: the liquids leak from the bottom
customer_reviews.text: when making smoothies the liquid leaks from the bottom causing it to spill out. horrible mess! i have to constantly tighten it with an allen wrench for it not to spill. when it is tightened it works like a beast. im not really satisfied with it but i havent found the time to return it.
customer_reviews.author: b.lxndr

customer_reviews.title: Solid, relatively quiet blender
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Significantly quieter than our “regular” blender, which is what we hoped when we bought it. Seems to have good power and a decent variety of blending options.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Kisela

customer_reviews.title: Great Price & Value
customer_reviews.text: Saw this product at our local Smoothie Shop. When I saw it on here, I bought it immediately. I’m not disappointed. Great shakes. Tasty Frozen Margaritas. Don’t waste your money on the high dollar type. This works fine.
customer_reviews.author: SpinBo

customer_reviews.title: Not loud
customer_reviews.text: I sold them right reviews. But I wanted to say that this is a great blender. I had done some research trying to find a quieter blenda because I've been using a ninja that was so loud couldn't be used when anybody was sleeping in the house. I highly recommend this blender and as blenders go it is on the quieter side.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Culling

customer_reviews.title: this is the blender to get simple to use and works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: HAVE USED THIS BLENDER FOR OVER A WEEK NOW AND AM CONVINCED THIS WAS THE BEST CHOICE. WHO NEEDS MORE THAT START/STOP, PULSE AND SPEED CONTROL KNOB? UNLESS YOU MUST HAVE LOTS OF KNOBS AND USELESS FEATURES LIKE DIGITAL DISPLAY, BLUE TOOTH CONNECTION, ETC. THIS IS THE WAY TO GO. HIGHLY RECOMMEND TO THOSE WHO WANT A SOLID BLENDER FOR FROZEN DRINKS, SMOOTHIES, ETC.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for making smoothies since our other blender left chunks. This works great! Smoothies are "smooth" and its also very easy to clean. We use this 4 or 5 times a week and have no complaints! Much less expensive than other brands and does just as good of a job!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Made frozen margaritas for a crowd, and this blender made it an absolute snap. Fast and powerful.
customer_reviews.author: grits

customer_reviews.title: Powerfull and smooth blender
customer_reviews.text: Home cooking. My son calls it "The V8 Blender" powerfull and smooth. We Love it!
customer_reviews.author: All*Tex

customer_reviews.title: Just like any other appliance with good care it should last.
customer_reviews.text: I used it to crush garden tomatoes, did a good job, powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Jennieann Ray

customer_reviews.title: Pulverizes very well.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my new blender and would highly recommend. The 32 oz size is large enough ( was worried it would be too small). I am mainly making smoothies for myself. All the veggies, nuts and fruits pulverize completely. I use the quiet shield and am satisfied with the sound level as that was a concern of mine and the main reason I chose this model.
customer_reviews.author: Julie M

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this blender for three weeks and it has exceeded my expectations. I a very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: nancy e. bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a fried and they love it. They were especially impresssed by how powerful it is.
customer_reviews.author: PAULINA ST. CLAIR

customer_reviews.title: Well built blender
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had purchased a blender like this a long time ago. I've been through several lesser blenders over the years. And I'm immediately glad I upgraded this time. This is a well made machine. It washes in the dishwaser, but it's easily cleaned without the dishwaser. I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: John Deneen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I used this blender once. I thought it was going to be great to make cocktails. However, the first time I used it, the blade locked up and would not work. Not happy and won't be buying any more of this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Blends well, but not so quietly!
customer_reviews.text: It does a good job as a smoothie maker. But the noise isn't low as claimed. You can reduce it a little if you keep holding the "shield" (a square jar placed upside down covering-up the blender jar). If it fitted more tightly, the noise should be lower. The blender jar fitting in the base is also somewhat loose, increasing the noise. These ill designs seem simple to correct; the question is: why Hamilton Beach haven't taken care oi it yet?
customer_reviews.author: E. do Val

customer_reviews.title: Very good blender
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny! One of the best blenders I ha e had in 6 years. I only wish it was a little bigger that is my only complaint
customer_reviews.author: Leila

customer_reviews.title: Leaky. Poor craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.text: The blender has good power, but the bottom seal failed after just 5 months of use. It was used several times a week for smoothies and protein shakes. That’s it. I’ll be contacting the manufacturer, but I’m dismayed by the poor build quality.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Really liked my blender until it started leaking. It leaks from the bottom while blending.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and good power
customer_reviews.text: Quiet! Good power! Makes great smoothies and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: marie savery

customer_reviews.title: mixes well and is easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: For my home this is very quiet. mixes well and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great value
customer_reviews.text: Having tried the lower cost blender previously with mixed results, I decided to buy one that I thought would be worth the price. I am very pleased that I upgraded. Smoothies and margaritas now are a pleasure. The power is amazing. More than worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Don B. Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Sweet blender!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! Definitely quieter than other's i've used in the past. Love the settings as well. Good overall blender purchase!
customer_reviews.author: J.Fish

customer_reviews.title: Great invention
customer_reviews.text: Still noisy, but it turns off by itself, so you can just leave the room until it's done, which is a great help.
customer_reviews.author: no

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: So far I haven’t found anything to dislike. So far I have send it for pesto, hummus, tahini, frozen chai latte, nut butters. Easy to use and clean. Don’t use the noise shield but when I have it is most effective.
customer_reviews.author: smartcat

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and cost effective!
customer_reviews.text: I like the smoothie cycle as it starts slow and progresses to a faster speed. Then it shuts off. And the timing on this cycle is perfect! The cover helps with noise reduction.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Willis

customer_reviews.title: Fast, easy clean, not so quiet, great smoothie
customer_reviews.text: The smoothie function worked great! Had my smoothie finished in less than a minute using frozen bananas, strawberries and peaches with apple juice. It says it is quiet, which compared to my old blender it is, but it is still loud. Have only used it twice so far. The clean function worked as expected and rinsed easily. Overall great product, I would recommend this blender.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: stunning smoothies
customer_reviews.text: Seen a lot of blenders in my time, and they all pretty much blend together (no pun intended)...but this one, I gotta say, is pretty spectacular so far. Deals a fine smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: Gritty Fox

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for smoothies!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this blender. I was going for something more quiet but still has the balls to make smooties with frozen fruit every morning. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Smith

customer_reviews.title: Blender facts and foibles
customer_reviews.text: Blending power and ease of cleaning are impressive. Appears to be well constructed. The noise shield definitely helps but this is still a noisy machine. It’s a necessary trade-off.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Not too loud
customer_reviews.text: Not as ear shattering as the ninja. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Famazon

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 8 uses. Blade stopped spinning when motor engaged. Defective product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It isn't easy to get a fine puree
customer_reviews.text: My husband grows his own horseradish. It isn't easy to get a fine puree. This machine is fantastic. It makes the finest horseradish I have ever made. We also use it to make our tomato sauces from our canned tomatoes. Never find a seed. does a beautiful job
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a must buy
customer_reviews.text: Hamilton Beach did a great job with this blender! Quiet, powerful, and affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Jared DeBorde

customer_reviews.title: Clumsy & Noisy
customer_reviews.text: Did not like this blender. The "noise shield" (basically an upside down pitcher, that I didn't feel I have use for) did not shield from the noise at all.. This however, was not the main reason for returning this blender. It was the clumsy design. I found the lack of handle to the jar itself made it very hard to remove the lid. Returned this blender and went with its big brother - the 1800W/64 Oz Jar (model 58850), which makes great smoothies. Might be as loud as this model, but its very convenient to use.
customer_reviews.author: H. Nachman

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expexted
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. Thought blades would crush ice to make SMOOTH smoothies. Still chunks
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia I. Driscoll

customer_reviews.title: Great blender - and quiet!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great blender. It works well and is much quieter than my Nutra Bullet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Built to last!
customer_reviews.text: It is very solid with metal versus gear and drive!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Young

customer_reviews.text: Not enough power did not want “plastic” cannot blend up frozen strawberries etc...
customer_reviews.author: DARLENE CROWSON

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, not as quiet as expected but sill far better than previous machine...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the purchase. Never had one before but I new I wanted one that had some power and reduced noise. Used it twice in last 3 weeks and am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jim DeCoste

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful and works in split second timing. Glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: just order a new one and life is good. A replacement is $90
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blender in July, less than 6 month's later the thin plastic blender jar cracks at the bottom while blending an iced fruit drink, not a problem you would think, just order a new one and life is good. A replacement is $90, are you serious the entire blender was $135, I would not recommend this blender to anyone only due to the thin plastic blender jar .
customer_reviews.author: rod

customer_reviews.title: just love it it dose the job way better then other ...
customer_reviews.text: just love it it dose the job way better then other i have try dose what it say
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job and is fairly quiet with the shield around the blender.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Soooo Loud
customer_reviews.text: The blender is great however it's so loud, I'm stuck with it since the box was discarded by my husband. Ugh The quiet shield is pointless though it works as a pitcher.
customer_reviews.author: @VS_NIEVES

customer_reviews.title: Major disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a new blender, received a used one with water spots and dried food particles all over plug. Major disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am sure this is a good blender however it does not work in South Africa ...
customer_reviews.text: I am sure this is a good blender however it does not work in South Africa (very disappointed) as bought it as a gift for someone...This product shouldn't be sold to South African's of its not compatible with our currency.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works much better than our old Cuisinart that was recalled due to ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this new blender. It works much better than our old Cuisinart that was recalled due to the blade breaking. The quiet shield works well but let me tell you, this thing is LOUD regardless. That is the only reason I gave it 4 stars. Otherwise, smoothies come out fantastic!!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not as quiet as I thought
customer_reviews.text: Great blender for the cost, it would have been a five star but it is loud even with the quiet shield on. Makes great smoothies and I use it a lot to puree food for my elderly mother and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: WhiteChilli

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Beach Professional 1800W Blender
customer_reviews.text: After researching for some time, I settled on this Hamilton Beach Professional 1800W Blender. It is perfect for what I need and is supposed to be able to make nut butters...something I have yet to try. It has a sturdy, glass carafe with metal gears in bottom. Cleans up easily. Is quiet for a blender. It is a taller machine but it fits under my cupboards on my counter. I am very pleased with this blender!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great, even pulverization of ice and fruit for smoothies and blended coffee drinks.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for smoothies daily for a few months and really like it. I realized it was costly and hoped it was worth it. It is so different from ordinary blenders - I like the smoothie setting not only for smoothies, but to make my own frappuccinos. The program cycles it on and off a few times then goes to high speed. This ensures the ice/frozen fruit chunks get fully broken down and turned into uniform bits. Trying to make a frappuccino with an ordinary blender leaves me with a cold watery/icy drink. Not with this - it fully blends amazingly well. You'll save alot over buying Starbucks with this!
customer_reviews.author: reader and maker

customer_reviews.title: Much quieter blender than other brands
customer_reviews.text: The whole reason I was looking for a new blender was because my family would complain about how loud my Ninja was. Like ear piercing noise. With this blender you can have a conversations while it blends. The cover to reduce the noise does a great job. Only thing I wish is that there were other size jars you could get with it. I have been searching and the pamphlet that came with it said there is a personal blender jar you can get that is smaller, but can't find it anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jlpontow

customer_reviews.title: Weak Motor
customer_reviews.text: I used this 6 or 7 times to make a smoothie consisting of almond milk, dino kale, agave syrup, frozen bananas, and frozen mango/blueberries/cherries (whatever fruit I had). It had so much trouble blending. The last time I used it, smoke started pouring out the back of it. I turned it off and unplugged it but the rancid smoke kept coming out for a while and made my house stink. My smoothies can be drank via a straw, so I wasn't making IN-and-Out milk shakes. Hamilton Beach should be embarrassed for making this sorry blender. I returned it and bought a Blend-Tec. That thing will blend small vehicles!!!
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Salt

customer_reviews.title: Staff hated it and when I tried it I could see ...
customer_reviews.text: AWFUL! I didn't know a blender could be awful. Purchased for our coffee shop to make frappes and smoothies. Staff hated it and when I tried it I could see why. Doesn't pull liquid down, so you have to stop, scrape and repeat. Smoothie option only works to complete the smoothie about 1/4 of the time. Replaced with a $70 alternative that works like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: TCUMiss

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Hey if u can't spend 400.00 this is the one. Smoothie done in 60 seconds and didn't wake up my wife. Yeah it's not 400.00 silent. But it's such an improvement over my crappy Cuisinart. Does Any One Remember Back When Cuisinart was actually quiet! Oh that's when it was made in America nevermind. But anyway this is great quality for the price Very happy with it. Have gone thru many noisy blenders. This is the best at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Roman A.

customer_reviews.title: Good product if it worked
customer_reviews.text: Once again i received another Amazon warehouse deals where they resold defective returned product. I know i take that risk by trying to save a few bucks and should learn AWD does no screening to insure the products being resold from a return actually work. Thank goodness for a good return policy from Amazon and the manufacturer was more than willing to step in and provide another path to correct a defective product. Its too bad it has to get to this.
customer_reviews.author: C. gibson

customer_reviews.title: Just not that good...
customer_reviews.text: This blender, sadly, is not as powerful as I expected. I am making green smoothies with a little frozen fruit added and have to run it a LONG time to get everything blended smoothly. On the plus side, it does eventually get the produce blended smoothly, but takes much longer than I would have thought. I would not buy this again for my purposes. A lot of money for so little return.
customer_reviews.author: Wowwy Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Professional quality machine
customer_reviews.text: Save your money and buy this blender! It's attractive, and it blends ice and fruit without lumps to make a perfect smoothie! No need to buy a 500 dollar blender. My only tiny gripe is that the blender only blends small amounts at a time, so if I needed to make a pitcher full of Margaritas I'd have to do it in a few batches. No big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Ronsatron

customer_reviews.title: We are very impressed with the noise level.
customer_reviews.text: We had to replace our blender because the old one did the job but it was so loud! I would have to take it to a different room away from people to use. We didn't want to spend a fortune on a new blender. We ordered this one and are very content on the noise level.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: works great and the shield greatly reduces noise
customer_reviews.text: works great and the shield greatly reduces noise. The jug, however, is a bit smaller than a regular sized blender.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Solid, well built blender
customer_reviews.text: So far we are loving this blender! Built to last and seems to have no problem crushing ice to snow cone consistency! If it can do that, there isn’t much else it can’t tackle!
customer_reviews.author: dbbdanford

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, quiet, and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: The epitome of "expensive isn't always better". My family bought a ninja bullet and it was the loudest machine we've ever used. Awful to say the least. But this Hamilton Beach blender is the most spectacular blender Iver EVER owned! It's quiet, powerful, and so easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Terese

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't Great For Me
customer_reviews.text: Unless you're making a large batch, this will not be great for an everyday blender. The blending power was not good for me for that reason. It also may not easily fit under a cabinet on your countertop.
customer_reviews.author: happyann

customer_reviews.title: Smoothies
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job on smoothies - haven't used it for much else I guess its quieter - the dog doesn't bark at it as much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blends anything and does it well!
customer_reviews.text: Power is what you need in a blender and this HBPro has it! I does an amazing job and takes care of all of your blending needs! Must have for the person who loves smoothies, bakes and shakes!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Joline

customer_reviews.title: Great blender
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this every day for protein smoothies. It's very quiet when you put the damper on. The self clean option is really wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: vmattoni

customer_reviews.title: QUIET, blends well
customer_reviews.text: Super quiet, definitely a step up from the college margarita mixer.
customer_reviews.author: fsjdw2

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this blender works well, and is very quite considering the ice its crushing!!
customer_reviews.author: g.cannon Mobile,Al

customer_reviews.title: Best Blender I've Ever Had
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2-3 blenders before this one and they were absolutely no match for this one. It works exactly as you would expect. It's easy to clean. It's quiet. I make smoothies for breakfast just about daily and it meets my every need. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: D. Marentette

customer_reviews.title: Great blender!
customer_reviews.text: Have this blender since December and I am super happy with it. Very quiet, compared to my old ninja. Lots of power for blending shakes and smoothies which I like to do. I recommend it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: JRod

customer_reviews.title: Jar cracks quickly - useless as cannot get replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Decent enough blender, but the plastic jar is cheap and flimsy. It has cracked all over and leaks. I am afraid it will break apart while I blend. Can't get replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It's powerful. It's much quieter than my previous versions and though I'm sure all the parts were probably made in the same place as every other blender I've owned, this one just feels like it's better quality. It's easy to clean and so far, still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Lainna

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach Professional Quiet Shield Blender, 1500W, 32oz BPA Free Jar, 4 Programs & Variable Speed Dial for Puree, Ice Crush, Shakes and Smoothies, Silver (58870)
product_meta.description: Style Name:1500 Watt - 4 ProgramsBring commercial quality performance to your kitchen countertop with the Hamilton Beach professional 1500-watt quiet shield blender with 32 oz BPA-free jar & 4 programs.
feature_bullets: Crushes Ice and Frozen Ingredients Fast Powerful 1500 Watt/ 20 Peak Hp and Hardened, Stainless Steel Blades Works Through Hard Ingredients in Seconds
Removable Quiet Shield Dampens Noise During the Blending Process; Infinite Speed Control Ranges From Super Slow 3,000 RPM to Fast 18,000 RPM
4 Program Settings Smoothie, Ice Crush, Puree, and Clean Offer One-Touch Convenience and Easy Cleanup Variable Speed Dial Provides Control
32 Oz Shatterproof Jar BPA-Free Jar Included Tamper Fits Through Lid to Help Bled Dense Ingredients
Dishwasher-Safe Parts the Blender Jar, Lid and Tamper Are All Dishwasher Safe as Well
